mapper.select: select * from tbl_area order by area_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_area_theater(area_no, area_theater_no, area_theater_name) values(#{area_no}, seq_area_theater_no.nextval, #{area_theater_name})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_theater_seat order by area_theater_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_area_theater(area_theater_no, theater_name, theater_seatNum) values(#{area_theater_no}, #{theater_name}, #{theater_seatNum})
